title: Win It Weekly: Panaracer Gravel Tire Adventure Pack
content:
How does Win It Weekly work?

Simply fill out the form below for your chance to win a Panaracer gravel tire adventure pack.

Prize:

  • Gravelking Slick – one pair
  • Gravelking Semi-Slick – one pair
  • Gravelking Knobby – one pair
  • 500ml Sealsmart Sealant – one bottle
  • MSRP US$320

Prize Details:

Get ready to go gravel riding this summer courtesy of Panaracer. The winner of this incredible adventure pack will be able to choose a pair of their preferred sizes of the three types of tires offered (based upon availability) – Gravelking Slick, Gravelking Semi-Slick, and Gravelking Knobby. Also included is a bottle of Sealsmart Sealant.

The post Win It Weekly: Panaracer Gravel Tire Adventure Pack appeared first on CyclingTips.
author: CyclingTips
